name: @pkm-assistant/monorepo
description: PKM Assistant - Personal Knowledge Management tools for developers

scripts.package:chrome: cd browser && npm run build && cd chrome && zip -r ../chrome-extension.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'
scripts.package:firefox: cd browser && npm run build && cd firefox && zip -r ../firefox-extension.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'
scripts.release:prepare: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run package:all
